headline: RTX Contracts And Singapore Expansion Put Defense Growth In Focus
summary: Raytheon, part of RTX (NYSE:RTX), has entered into long term framework agreements with the U.S. Department of Defense to ramp up production of key precision munitions. The company is expanding aerospace maintenance, repair, and overhaul operations in Singapore, alongside broader investments in aerospace capabilities. Raytheon has been selected by DARPA to develop an advanced maritime sensing and targeting system for emerging threats. RTX, trading at $195.97, has seen a 55.0% return over the...
